accessible.description: Chakra UI strictly follows WAI-ARIA standards for all components.

growing-section.title: Chakra is growing quickly
growing-section.description: We're dedicated to improving the experience and performance of Chakra UI.

event-section.title: Invite us to speak at your next event
event-section.description: Want a Chakra UI core team member to speak at your next event? Invite us to create a memorable and engaging experience for your attendees.

seo.title: Unikraft is a fast, secure and open-source Unikernel Development Kit.
seo.description: Unikraft is a fast, secure and open-source Unikernel Development Kit which enables you to build custom, minimal, immutable ultra-lightweight unikernel virtual machines quickly and easily.

notfound.title: Page(table) Not Found
notfound.description: The page you are looking for cannot be found.  If you believe this is a mistake, please open an issue on our documentation repository. Thank you!

tutorialError.title: Ooops something broke
tutorialError.heading: Ooops something broke üò≠
tutorialError.message: You just found a really nasty issue. We are aware of it. Just hit 'Reload' and code on!
tutorialError.submessage: PS: Try to have no code selected in the sandbox before copying new code üòâ

seo.title: Talks & Presentations
seo.description: Find presentations about Unikraft at leading academic and industrial conferences.

talks.message: The Unikraft community regularly speaks and presents at relevant scientific and practical conferences.  On this page you can find and watch previously held talks.

seo.title: Peer-reviewed Papers & Publications
seo.description: Unikraft has appeared in world-class scientific journals and articles.

seo.title: Unikraft Hackathons and Workshops
seo.description: We organize hackathons and workshops to help people make their first steps in Unikraft and learn more about operating systems, virtualizaion and unikernel technology.

hackathons.message: We aim to have hackathons and workshops as face-to-face events for maximum support from the Unikraft community members acting as teaching assistants (TAs) and support crew. In any case (face-to-face or strict only), the hackathon will also take place on Unikraft Discord with talks / presentations, breakout rooms and virtual support from Unikraft TAs. If you want to host a Unikraft hackathon, please get in touch with us. You‚Äôll get to expose your students, or members of your technical community to the cool topics behind open source OS development with Unikraft.

seo.title: Unikraft Guides
seo.description: Learn how to use Unikraft in new ways with our series of guides which help you get started.

egghead-course-banner.heading: Build a Modern User Interface with Chakra UI
egghead-course-banner.description: In this free course, you will learn the basics of Chakra UI and how to build well-designed, accessible user interfaces with speed!
